org.lafayette.server.web.service.data

Class ServiceDescriptorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lafayette.server.web.service.data.ServiceDescriptorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceDescriptor

     class ServiceDescriptorImpl
extends Object
implements ServiceDescriptor
    Describes services by examine annotations. For the service main description the service annotation is examined. For the API descriptions the API annotation is examined.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter
